en.流动的声音，链接的心灵。: The sound of flowing, the connection of souls.
en.无论你在世界的哪个角落，都能找到一位愿意倾听的朋友。: Wherever you are globally, a listening friend can be found.
en.无论你是跨越时区的深夜微语，还是清晨的轻松问候，在这里，每一个声音都将被珍视与尊: Regardless of time, every voice here is valued and respected.
en.加入我们，倾诉你的故事，聆听他人的声音，让浑河的每一滴水波，都载满我们的交谈与分: Join us, share your story, listen to the voices of others, and let every ripple in the river carry our conversations and sharing.
en.重新连接失败，请刷新页面重试: You are somehow offline, please try to refresh the page
en.浏览器不支持语音或视频: The client's browser does not support some or all WebRTC features that you are trying to use

zh.流动的声音，链接的心灵。: 流动的声音，链接的心灵。
